Company Name: Zahrat Al Waha for Trading Co (3007)
Description: Zahrat Al Waha for Trading Co (Known as: OASIS) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since September 2017. OASIS operates within the Capital Goods sector focusing on Trading Companies & Distributors. OASIS is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in October 2003.
